reviews.review_msg: She is amazing. Pros: Lectures were fun and engaging. Flexible with deadlines. Really cares about the topics. Easy participation marks. Assignments have lots of options. Cons: No lecture notes - just ppts w/ pictures+notes for herself 5min before lec. Takes attendance. REALLY SLOW marker. Got prev assignment feedback the day final essay was due.

Coleman is SFU's greatest treasure. This is the third class I've taken with her and every one of them has been exceptional. She designs courses in a very accommodating way (i.e. 3 day grace period for handing in assignments, make-up marks possible, no tests). It's easy to do well in her classes and you'll be a better person for having taken them!

Dr. Nye is a fantastic prof. She is passionate and knowledgeable about what she teaches, conveys complicated subject matter in an easy to understand way, and her classes feel comfortable and friendly. She shows a genuine interest in her students well-being and wants you to learn, not memorize. I refer back to things learned in her class often!
